Producer: Maria Gabriela Cardenas, Oscar Cardenas, Amy Williams
Rating: R (Nudity|Gruesome Images|A Rape|Drug Material|Sexual Content|Disturbing Violent Content|Language)
Synopsis: A guilt-ridden FBI agent, stranded in the painful memory of the abduction of his sister, will have to face-off with the cunning serial killer who took her away.
Title: A Dark Foe
